data.message:
I bought the official product number 63722588, payment via credit card, whose exchange is being ataulizado to date and NOT RECEIVED THE PRODUCT. ALREADY CAME WITH CLAIM 140529-000805 AND NO RESULTS TO DATE. 
I look briefest contact, because if you do not receive the product, I'll sue within the Brazilian laws, agencies and prosecutors as Procon. 
Regards, 
Claudia Padua Torres - Belo Horizonte, 10 de junho de 2014.
